query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS inspectionRequests (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  taskId INT NOT NULL,
  requestedBy INT NOT NULL,
  requestedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  inspectorId INT,
  status ENUM('pending', 'approved', 'rejected', 'completed') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
  notes TEXT,
  approvedBy INT,
  approvedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  rejectedReason TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX taskIdIdx (taskId),
  INDEX requestedByIdx (requestedBy),
  INDEX inspectorIdIdx (inspectorId),
  INDEX statusIdx (status)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 33MDJNP9oQHNu88.9be2e504806b --database XGUfRkFw3wTJbZrCqsFJBu --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS inspectionRequests (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  taskId INT NOT NULL,
  requestedBy INT NOT NULL,
  requestedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  inspectorId INT,
  status ENUM('pending', 'approved', 'rejected', 'completed') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
  notes TEXT,
  approvedBy INT,
  approvedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  rejectedReason TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX taskIdIdx (taskId),
  INDEX requestedByIdx (requestedBy),
  INDEX inspectorIdIdx (inspectorId),
  INDEX statusIdx (status)
)
